name: Merge with Familiar
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Ultimate Wilderness © 2017, Paizo Inc.
target: your familiar or spirit animal; see text
text: As long as the target is at least one size category smaller than you are, it can merge harmlessly into your body while under the effect of this spell. For the duration of this spell, you and the target can separate or merge at will as a move action. While merged, your familiar or spirit animal can't be targeted or affected by most attacks and effects, though it still suffers from ongoing effects and their durations continue. It can be the recipient of effects that originate from you.
target_zh: 你的魔宠或魂兽；见正文
text_zh: 只要目标的体型比你小至少一个级别，它就在法术效果下无害地融入到你体内。在法术的持续期间，你和你的魔宠都能够以移动动作来随意分离或再度融合。当魔宠融入到你体内时，你的魔宠或魂兽无法以任何方式成为绝大多数攻击和效果的目标或被影响，但它仍会受到持续性的效果，而且这些效果的持续时间仍会流逝。魔宠此时能成为从你发出的效果的接收方。
